title: Flipped Learning English Education Design Utilizing Augmented Reality-Based Game Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental proficiency in operating digital devices
context.additional_context: Program for science professionals to enhance job-related English vocabulary and creative thinking; must be implementable in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can acquire and utilize over 10 science-related English technical vocabulary items per week through an augmented reality (AR)-based board game.
Participants can propose three or more creative problem-solving strategies through game-based collaborative activities.
Participants can achieve over 90% attendance in offline classes within a flipped learning environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
